TEI.2.document_title: Archibald Austin to Stephen F Austin, 05-22-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Archibald Austin to Austin, May 22, 1831. Live oak for ship building. Emigration. European news. (See page 772.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 662
